name: Pixel Sentry
description:
Do you have nothing to do?

Don't want to load up a game where it takes a while to get into it?

Well here is the perfect solution for you.

Pixel sentry is a wave based game that requires skill and luck.

It is a perfect game for someone that needs something fast to jump into.
It's a game that you will be able to speed run but you will also be able to just chill play the game.

This game is worth it's price. Think about every time you are waiting and have nothing to do. Then you can just jump into Pixel Sentry and do a fast game.

The game is about shooting enimies that fly against you.
In the middle and at the end of every round you will get some crates. The brown crates will give you powerups like more health more damage or more attack speed. The Gold crates will give you more powerfull powerups that can be combined with other powerups. And then the red crates takes away 2 health but they have a chanse to give you a really good powerup.

Each game is about 100s depending if you speed up the game. And the game has 10 rounds right now. And after the 10 rounds you will start a infinit loop until you run out of health.

At the end of every game you will get coins. The amount of coins is determined by how long you got into the game. And with the coins you can by new centrys.
